BigText: Sizga muvaffaqiyat sari yo‘l ko‘rsatadigan tajribali mutaxassislar

Mentors.about: 10 yildan ortiq dasturlash tajribasi, 500 dan ortiq muvaffaqiyatli bitiruvchilar, ko‘plab xalqaro loyihalar muallifi
Mentors.tools: ReactJS, Vue.js, Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, AWS, CI/CD

Mentors.about: Grafik dizayn va raqamli san'at sohasida tajribali o‘qituvchi
Mentors.tools: Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, UI/UX, After Effects, Premiere Pro, CorelDraw

Mentors.about: Frontend va zamonaviy web texnologiyalar bo‘yicha tajribali o‘qituvchi
Mentors.tools: ReactJS, JavaScript, Redux, Material UI, Bootstrap, Git, Webpack

Mentors.about: 100 dan ortiq muvaffaqiyatli talabalarni yetishtirgan tajribali frontend instruktori
Mentors.tools: ReactJS, TypeScript, Next.js, Redux, Tailwind CSS, Git

Mentors.about: Python va backend dasturlash bo‘yicha tajribali o‘qituvchi
Mentors.tools: Python, Django, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, Git, Linux
